article.Heading: Budget 2016: Key numbers to watch out for
article.Summary: Watch accompanying video of CNBC-TV18's Latha Venkatesh on key numbers that we need to watch out for.
article.Body:
Will the government deviate from the fiscal consolidation roadmap in order to boost growth?

Watch accompanying video of CNBC-TV18's Latha Venkatesh on key numbers that we need to watch out for.
